channel.title: ToL quits after entering
channel.description:
#### What happened?
After I enter the game and click the log in button, the game crashes
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
The game was not supposed to crash
#### Steps to reproduce:
1: Click the Log in button 2: Crash
#### Comments:
This has happened repeatedly ever since the Windows 7 Support update. I have yet to play a game of ToL.

item.title: ToL quits after entering
item.dc:creator: Kape
item.description:
Have you tried changing your resolution or playing in windowed/fullscreen.
Have heard that playing around with those options fixes the weird crash.

Read full topic
